pullRequest.title: Make file sharing format configurable
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds a settings to set the trackfileformat used for sharing.
If go down this route: we can use this as the default file format for export & import as well.
And remove the FileTypeDialogFragment.
Code is ready, but need to figure out how we proceed with FileTypeDialogFragment.

nodes.bodyText: If track file format is not set KML format is used by default, why not KMZ?

commit.message:
Settings: added default sharing track file format.
Fixes #225.
Export/Import: TrackFileFormat is now selected via settings only.

Export: do not show progress of exported TrackPoints.
Only the overall number of tracks is shown now (similar to import).

beforeCommit.message:
Export: do not show progress of exported TrackPoints.
Only the overall number of tracks is shown now (similar to import).

afterCommit.message:
Export: do not show progress of exported TrackPoints.
Only the overall number of tracks is shown now (similar to import).
